about_the_game:
Complete Various Missions and Earn Legendary Rewards

The city is overrun with villains, and your team is the one to stop them. Put your heroes to the test in diverse battles: from epic duels to chaotic street brawls, and earn incredible rewards. Collect powerful gear, quirky costumes, and rare weapons to enhance your heroes' effectiveness and style.

Create Your Unique Heroes

Unleash your creativity with a vast selection of equipment parts and abilities! Mix, match, and build your team of perfect superheroes. Want a robot with a medieval helmet wielding a katana? No problem! In "Spectacular Team: Assemble," every hero is a unique, unpredictable masterpiece.

Experiment with Abilities

Your heroes' power goes far beyond fists and weapons. Equip them with a wide range of super abilities: from telekinesis and laser vision to vampirism and teleportation. Mix and match abilities to create wild combinations that will surprise enemies and make your heroes unstoppable.

Develop Your Command Center

Your hero factory isn’t just a base; it’s the key to saving the world! Upgrade your command center to unlock new technologies, expand your team, and refine hero production. Turn your base into an extraordinary hub of superhero excellence and assemble the ultimate team!

Assemble Your Dream Team and Save the World

From modifying heroes to completing missions and upgrading your base, "Spectacular Team: Assemble" delivers action, creativity, and chaos. Dive into the most unexpected physics-based superhero experience—where every battle is a chance to be truly spectacular!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 or AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 or AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit system

short_description: Spectacular Team: Assemble is a physics-based action game where heroes collide in chaotic battles. Create outrageous characters, unleash wild moves, and watch them crash, tumble, and brawl their way through hordes of villains. Pure, unpredictable action in every fight!
